commit.message:
re PR c++/7768 (__PRETTY_FUNCTION__ for template destructor is wrong)

cp:
	PR c++/7768
	* pt.c (build_template_decl): Copy DECL_DESTRUCTOR_P.
testsuite:
	* g++.dg/template/pretty1.C: New test

From-SVN: r57152
